subject: Football (College)
Football
Books and Literature
College Athletics
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: Jay Paterno, the son of the football coach Joe Paterno, has written a book in defense of his father, who was caught up in the Jerry Sandusky sex abuse scandal at Penn State.
snippet: Jay Paterno, the son of the football coach Joe Paterno, has written a book in defense of his father, who was caught up in the Jerry Sandusky sex abuse scandal at Penn State.
